112231.content:
You feel a shaking movement as the hand of your other sister grasped you.

"What was that for?!" Susan yelled.

"He's mine." Mary said with a wide and evil grin. She makes her waY to the kitchen and decides that you need some more ingredients, and takes out the gigantic ketchup container.

She squeezes the bun shut so your biggest attempt to escape is useless. You are sealed tight as she lifts the Heinz bottle up and squeezes it, ketchup falling onto your tiny body. She laughs at your squirming, licking you up and sitting down at the kitchen table.

"It's alright Johnny, we'll just transfer your consciousness to one of the clones we have waiting for you once you are fully digested." Mary explains to you. "By the end of the day well have eaten you enough that you'll know our both of our esophagusses like the back of your hand." She then raises you to her open mouth and shuts her teeth intimidatively. She laughs at the look of pure terror in your eyes as she opens her pearly white teeth to reveal her uvula dangling. She then thrusts your body forward into her mouth and starts chewing the bun around you, being careful to miss you. You feel her slimy moist tongue below you, throwing you around in the mixture of bread and ketchup.

You are caught between her lips as she sucks what little ketchup you have still on you as she replaces it with her saliva. You are then disposed of into the dark, damp cave known as Mary Test's mouth, being tossing you around like the tiny morsel you have become. She then says "goodbye!" As she takes a definitive gulp and you fly down the throat of your sister. You feel every muscle contract along your fall as you then are dispensed into her stomach. It is warm, as you waddle through the fluid. You can feel every movement of your sister as she pats her stomach, and releases a loud belch.

122.content:
Johnny surfaced in Dukey's food bowl. "Phew that was so close, ok buddy you can...". Johnny looked down and realized he was in Dukey's dog food and he was about the size of his kibble. Johnny went wide eyed and said, "did I shrink?!". He then felt some saliva drip onto his forehead. He turned around and saw his buddy with his tongue out.

Suddenly Dukey spook up, "oh yes buddy you did." Johnny look up at his dog and asked, "how did I shrink?" Dukey laughs his chuckling laugh and said, "that's quite simple buddy," Dukey looked at him, "I shrank you." Johnny looked scared but "knew" his buddy was joking, "oh haha now pull me out" Johnny said. Dukey laughed "no" and Johnny yelled at him, "why?!".

Dukey's stomach suddenly growled loudly. Dukey looked at Johnny in the food bowl, "I think that answers your question." Dukey bent and ate his dog food taking Johnny in with it. He made sure Johnny was on his tongue as he chewed his kibble.

Johnny was in a living hell, he was being tasted by his best buddy and dog. Dukey's breath stunk but it was worse in his mouth while shrunk. Dukey was tasting and savoring Johnny's flavor with the kibble. Dukey's stomach growled ready for Johnny and the food.

Dukey says to Johnny, "see you on the other side" Dukey chuckled and swallowed. Dukey went about his day. Johnny on the other hand was being squeezed down Dukey's esophagus and within a couple seconds he landed with a plop into his stomach.

"At least I will have a new life very soon after I'm digested" Johnny said.

Now will he be fully digested and be revived or only partially and have to travel through his best buddy's body?
122.title: Johnny's Journey to Dukey's Belly

info.brief_description: Johnny's sisters gave him a pill with a vorish side effect. Now he must avoid being lunch.
info.description:
Johnny Test is a flame-headed boy with an attitude and two genius twin sisters (Mary and Susan) to match.
He entered their lab one morning and they gave him a pill to swallow that will allow him to revive in a new body if harmed.
Unfortunately, this causes attraction to predators big and small and makes him change size to suit their needs.
Rules are simple - he can only be eaten whole through the mouth and cannot be involved in any sensual actions.
